name: Real Bike Race
description:
The Fat Biker Is ready to show his skills on this busy road track, he just want to beat all traffic so that he can reach on destination as soon as possible.
His ghost bike is designed for real racing and stunt purpose,many excellent animation of wheeling ,beating other car drivers and super cool accident animations for extra fun.
So speed up your moto and enjoy this real traffic road race,don't miss this excellent game.
Best of Luck and don't forget to rate us and share us with fellows.
